About Al Khizanah

Al Khizanah is a group of people gathered to make software. We collaborate on practical tools, shared infrastructure, and open documentation that support reliable product delivery.

Our Mission

We believe in building software that matters. Our focus is on creating tools and solutions that solve real problems and make developers' lives easier.

Contribution

We welcome contributions from the community. Here are some guidelines:

  • Open an issue before implementing large changes
  • Keep pull requests focused and include documentation updates
  • Follow consistent coding styles and write meaningful commit messages
  • Review feedback quickly and keep communication respectful

Get in Touch

Interested in collaborating or have questions? Check out our GitHub organization or open an issue in any of our project repositories.
